abilities.name: Tailwind
abilities.description: Innate: Janna passively gains  8% bonus movement speed and grants the same amount to nearby allied champions moving towards her.
descriptions: Innate: Janna passively gains  8% bonus movement speed and grants the same amount to nearby allied champions moving towards her.
Janna's basic attacks on-hit and  Zephyr deal bonus magic damage equal to 25 / 35% (based on level) of her bonus movement speed.

abilities.name: Howling Gale
abilities.description: Active: Janna summons a whirlwind at her current location which charges up over 3 seconds. Its range, speed, damage, and  knockup duration increase for each second it is left charging. Howling Gale can be recast after a short delay.
abilities.leveling: Minimum Magic Damage:60 / 85 / 110 / 135 / 160 (+ 35% AP)Bonus Magic Damage Per Second:»15 / 20 / 25 / 30 / 35 (+ 10% AP)«Maximum Magic Damage:105 / 145 / 185 / 225 / 265 (+ 65% AP)
levelings: Minimum Magic Damage:60 / 85 / 110 / 135 / 160 (+ 35% AP)Bonus Magic Damage Per Second:»15 / 20 / 25 / 30 / 35 (+ 10% AP)«Maximum Magic Damage:105 / 145 / 185 / 225 / 265 (+ 65% AP)
descriptions: Active: Janna summons a whirlwind at her current location which charges up over 3 seconds. Its range, speed, damage, and  knockup duration increase for each second it is left charging. Howling Gale can be recast after a short delay.

At the end of the duration, the whirlwind launches itself for 1.5 seconds in the target direction, dealing magic damage to all enemies it passes through and  knocking them up for 0.5 − 1.25 (based on seconds charged) seconds.
Recast: Janna launches the whirlwind early.

abilities.name: Zephyr
abilities.description: Passive: While Zephyr is not on cooldown, Janna is aided by an air elemental who  ghosts her and grants her  bonus movement speed.
descriptions: Passive: While Zephyr is not on cooldown, Janna is aided by an air elemental who  ghosts her and grants her  bonus movement speed.
Active: Janna commands her air elemental to attack the target enemy, dealing them magic damage and  slowing them for 2 seconds by an amount, capped at a maximum of 99%.

abilities.name: Eye of the Storm
abilities.description: Active: Janna  shields the target allied champion or herself for 5 seconds, decaying over the duration after 0.75 seconds.
descriptions: Active: Janna  shields the target allied champion or herself for 5 seconds, decaying over the duration after 0.75 seconds.
While the shield holds, her target gains  bonus attack damage.
Slowing or applying an  airborne effect with an ability to at least one enemy champion reduces Eye of the Storm's cooldown by 20%. This can only occur once per cast.
Eye of the Storm can be used on  turrets, causing Janna to be credited for any  champion kills it earns while the shield holds.

abilities.name: Monsoon
abilities.description: Active: Janna  channels for 3 seconds,  knocking back all nearby enemies at the time of cast to up to 875 units (but not through terrain) over 0.5 seconds based on their proximity to her.
abilities.leveling: Heal Per Half Second:»50 / 75 / 100 (+ 25% AP)«Total Heal:300 / 450 / 600 (+ 150% AP)
levelings: Heal Per Half Second:»50 / 75 / 100 (+ 25% AP)«Total Heal:300 / 450 / 600 (+ 150% AP)
descriptions: Active: Janna  channels for 3 seconds,  knocking back all nearby enemies at the time of cast to up to 875 units (but not through terrain) over 0.5 seconds based on their proximity to her.
While channeling, Janna releases soothing winds that  heal nearby allies every 0.5 seconds.

name: Janna
title: the Storm's Fury
blurb: Armed with the power of Runeterra's gales, Janna is a mysterious, elemental wind spirit who protects the dispossessed of Zaun. Some believe she was brought into existence by the pleas of Runeterra's sailors who prayed for fair winds as they navigated...
